mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_PROJECT_REVIEW_FILE (UUID, UPLOAD_PATH, FILE_NAME, REVIEW_NUM) VALUES (#{uuid}, #{uploadPath}, #{fileName}, #{reviewNum})
mapper.select: SELECT UUID, UPLOAD_PATH, FILE_NAME, REVIEW_NUM FROM TBL_PROJECT_REVIEW_FILE WHERE UPLOAD_PATH = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE - 1, 'YYYY/MM/DD')
